channel.title: Comments on: Visit to Berkeley Libraries

item.title: By: Sarah McClung
item.dc:creator: Sarah McClung
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2017/11/07/visit-to-berkeley-libraries/#comment-738">Julia Kochi</a>.
Ariel and I have connections at Cal Academy- I bet we could get this organized!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Julia Kochi.

Ariel and I have connections at Cal Academy- I bet we could get this organized!

item.title: By: Charles Macquarie
item.dc:creator: Charles Macquarie
item.description: Bummed I couldn't join! Glad you had fun.
item.content:encoded: Bummed I couldn’t join! Glad you had fun.

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description: So sorry I missed it. It looks like it was great fun! Maybe Cal Academy as a potential visit. I know they have a library/librarian there.
item.content:encoded: So sorry I missed it. It looks like it was great fun! Maybe Cal Academy as a potential visit. I know they have a library/librarian there.
